sip_release.sip_features: Added the options to Skip Active Request, Pipe-lined registers for each ISM and non-ISM router-to-router and router-endpoint communications. Fixed some script issues for VISA, Synthesis, CDC, and Lintra. Fixed some Dynamo startup scripts.
sip_release.sip_knissues: Cannot generation disjoint networks in the same session Lack of comprehensive user guide Scripts still need more work for VISA, Synthesis, CDC, and Lintra.
